characters.name: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek
characters.description: Battle-scarred Adaran cleric whose psionic scars glow whenever he channels Ioun's light. Sha'ek catalogues planar anomalies for Culdor Academy, doubles as the team's medic, and fights with calm, deliberate strikes that steady panicking allies.

characters.name: Pipira Shimmerlock
characters.description: Tinkerer-wizard whose spellbook is wrapped in copper filigree and packed with field prototypes. Pipira constantly narrates hypotheses, layers divinations over traps, and enters fights with a satchel of improvised clockwork focus stones.

characters.name: Fan'nar Khe'Lek
characters.description: Winter Eladrin scout known for silent footwork and sweeping tactical diagrams. Fan'nar tracks quarry by scent crystals embedded in their armor and alternates between flail bursts and precise cold arrow volleys when battles spread out.

characters.name: Furnax
characters.description: Frost hellhound rescued from a shattered planar gate. Furnax exhales rime clouds that muffle sound, pads ahead as the party's living perimeter alarm, and only obeys shouted Adaran command words from Pip and Sha'ek.

default.notes: Recon team cataloguing Gaia's magical storms for Culdor Academy. Keeps strict field logs, rotates leadership depending on mission profile, and shuns unknown extraplanar patrons.

characters.name: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek
characters.description: Solo operative version of Sha'ek who channels greater doses of radiant power and carries a reliquary kit for single-combat rituals. He relies on delayed-burst wards, carries a planar compass, and treats every encounter like a tactical puzzle against overwhelming odds.

characters.name: Pipira Shimmerlock
characters.description: Pipira consults remotely for Team OP, providing arcane telemetry, prototype spell grenades, and temporary familiars pre-loaded with scouting routines.

characters.name: Fan'nar Khe'Lek
characters.description: Fan'nar acts as Sha'ek's spotter when missions escalate, projecting icy sigils that mark cover routes and maintaining a floating ledger of favors owed to Team OP.

characters.name: Furnax
characters.description: Solo missions outfit Furnax with rune-branded barding that amplifies their chilling bay, letting Sha'ek lock down battlefields even without the rest of the Broken Seekers.

team_op.notes: Sha'ek-led strike force used for high-powered dungeon trials. Operates with heavy divination support and favors single-hero heroics backed by remote allies.

characters.name: Sha'ek Mindfa'ek
characters.description: Field-commander Sha'ek balances protective warding with relentless advance tactics. His journals outline precise healing rotations and recorded visions from Golos that warn of temporal fractures around Gaia.

characters.name: Pipira Shimmerlock
characters.description: Campaign archivist for the group. Pipira sketches every artifact, builds clever sound-cancelling devices before stealth runs, and keeps a hidden codex of custom counterspell phrases.

characters.name: Fan'nar Khe'Lek
characters.description: Fan'nar moonlights as the academy's artifact courier. Their winter magic flash-freezes doorframes, and they pair a spiked flail with vine-wrapped arrows to anchor foes in place for Sha'ek's channeling.

characters.name: Furnax
characters.description: Furnax's howl can etch hoarfrost circles that double as teleport beacons for the rest of the pack. The companion responds to treats stored in Pipira's bandolier and marks enemies with scent tags visible through Sha'ek's visor.

my_campaign.notes: Variant roster used when adapting Gaia Adventures to home campaigns. Encourages experimentation with artifact-driven objectives and cross-faction alliances.
